|802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 09/2008 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B008VM77XC |asin_country = US |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The '''Arris''' logo, "CM550 REV: 2.02C", "Copyright 2005", "ARRIS International, Inc.", <...>"CHINA" ("PCB MADE IN CHINA"?), and a date code of '''0836''' is silkscreened on one particular CM550A's board. :'''ASUS''' / '''Pegatron''' would appear to be the manufacturer of this device ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
[3.3] (TxD) (RxD) (GND)
J7
